name: Reindeer Story
detailed_description:
Lux the Reindeer and his friends are on a mission to protect Winter!

Join them in their struggle against the handpicked minions of Jack Frost! The Fate of the season is in the balance in this Wintery Adventure RPG

An exciting 6-chapter adventure awaits...Ride a snowmobile through the shivering Snowzone! Face foes in the Autumn Forest Knight Tournament. Take part in the war of Mice and the Nutcracker in Toy town!

Be a Deer!

  • Exploration with Platforming!

  • Fast paced RPG turn based battles with Action Commands!

  • Evade enemy attacks in real time and Use Z-Skills to strike foes during their turn!

  • Customise skills and abilities for battle!
  • A wide cast of cool, cute and crude characters!

Reindeer Story draws inspiration from a varied set of classic and modern RPGs including Paper Mario, Mario & Luigi, Final Fantasy 1-6 and Deltarune.

In the end the story of the red nose reindeer captured the hearts of millions...

short_description: Reindeer Story is a 2D Adventure RPG! Run, Jump and Battle through 6 chapters of this Wintery Epic! Fight foes in turn based battles with a real-time element, dodge enemies attacks in the Battle Zone and retaliate with Z-Skills!

  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1.60GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Play Tested on a HP Stream Laptop 11-y0xx . Would very likely run fine on lower specs
